long_description: The Julbo Booba sunglasses for boys protect little eyes during outside play. Free of finger-pinching hinges, these have flexible temples that let kids pull the sunglasses on and off repeatedly without damaging the frames. Rubber temple inserts help keep glasses securely on a child's face. Spectron 4 polycarbonate lenses block 100% of UV rays and 87% of visible light, reducing glare and creating a clear image. Flash lens treatment creates a mirror effect, improving light filitration. Lightweight polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and less than one-third the weight. Julbo Booba sunglasses include a soft microfiber storage pouch. Best fits kids ages 4 - 6 years old.
short_description: The Julbo Booba sunglasses for boys protect little eyes during outside play.
